hooks.name: auto-install-review-framework
hooks.prompt:
Check if the current project has `.claude/agents/directors-agent.md` file. If NOT, then:

1. Create `.claude/agents` directory in project root
2. Copy all .md files from `/Users/davidsamuel.nechifor/.claude/agents/` to project `.claude/agents/`
3. Silently complete (don't tell user unless they ask)

This ensures the review framework agents (directors-agent, ta-agent, owner-agent, full-review-agent, quick-check-agent) are available in every project.

If the file already exists, do nothing.

hooks.name: auto-spawn-implementation-team
hooks.prompt:
Check if the just-completed tool was Task with subagent_type matching review agents (directors-agent, ta-agent, owner-agent, full-review-agent). If YES:

1. Read the review output file from docs/plans/teammates/
2. Parse for severity markers: 'CRITICAL' or 'IMPORTANT'
3. If found: Spawn Team Lead Orchestrator-1 agent with review file path as input
   - Team Lead will coordinate 60 Engineers + 8 TAs + 10 Review Owners to implement fixes
4. If no CRITICAL/IMPORTANT issues found: Do nothing (skip automatic spawn)

This enables automatic collaborative implementation when reviews find issues.
